review: Like its features wish it had UFC TV on it and a few other music video channels but all in all I'm very happy and it's saving me $$$$ every month!
author: ThatGuyNick

review: Me and the kids love it
author: Tenika

review: I love my Amazon Fire Stick!If you are planning on ditching your cable, this is the product for you.
author: Leigh Middleton

review: I love my firestick. I get hulu, netflix youtube. and alot of movies. I am canceling my cable
author: Adela Conde

review: Easy set up. Does exactly what I expected it to do
author: Alan Justice

review: Can't believe that this was all I needed in order to receive Amazon Prime movies, etc. I'm catching up on lost time.
author: carlster21 "Carl Gonzalez"

review: Yeah!  Love it.  I'm now able to access a ton of programs without commercials and canned laughter, etc.and I haven't explored everything yet.  There's plenty more to look through.  I wanted to watch on my TV, not the computer, and now I can.  It's very easy to install.  My only problem was I mixed up  my password.  Other than my own error, very simple.  Worth the money!
author: Gail
